fullText: McDonald brings extraordinary vocal power and dramatic conviction to her portrayal of the tortured jazz legend, making this biographical play feel like a masterclass in performance.
dtliExcerpt: McDonald brings extraordinary vocal power and dramatic conviction to her portrayal of the tortured jazz legend, making this biographical play feel like a masterclass in performance.
